comments:
I had a CDT debug session stopped at a break point and subsequently opened 
another editor that is not a Text Editor. This caused an error dialog to pop 
up, saying an error has occurred. 

ResumeAtLineActionDelegate assumes all editors to be text editors and this 
throws a class cast exception.

Below is the stack trace.
